text: Amazonsaurus ( , "Amazon lizard") is a rebbachisaurid sauropod dinosaur from the Early Cretaceous Period of what is now South America. It would have been a four-legged herbivore with a long neck and whiplash tail. Amazonsaurus was probably not more than 12 meters (40 ft) long. Its weight was about 5000 kg (5 tons).Paul, G.S., 2010, The Princeton Field Guide to Dinosaurs, Princeton University Press p. 185 ==References== Category:Sauropods
title: Amazonsaurus
